knimeNode.name: PMML Ensemble Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Predicts data using a ensemble model

fullDescription.intro: The PMML Ensemble Predictor node takes a pmml document containing an ensemble of other models and executes all of them on the given data. The results from all models are then aggregated using a method specified in the ensemble model. The output contains a column for each prediction of the single models (if set in the settings) and one column with the combined result. Note that ensembles of ensembles are not supported with the exception of Gradient Boosted Trees which are treated base model. It's on the other hand not possible to predict Gradient Boosted Trees models with this predictor, please use the PMML Predictor node or the Gradient Boosted Trees Predictor (PMML) nodes for this task.
fullDescription.option: Determines whether the output contains one column for each model's prediction

option.name: Multiple model method as column name

fullDescription.option: Determines whether the column with the combined predictions should be named after the combination method
Determines what is output when there is a tie between two classes in the combination methods majority vote and weighted majority vote

ports.inPort: A PMML Model containing an ensemble mining model
ports.outPort: Prediction of every single model and the aggregated ensemble prediction
